@magpie1159 with an top heavy elderly population relying on a pension, I would imagine very little of out NI contributions go into the NHS
@magpie1159 common misconception , NI goes towards pensions , benefits AND the NHS
Ask people if they are willing to pay a #healthtax i would. If you knew it went directly to funding the #NHS i bet others would #bbcqt
I think the current uproar surrounding the #NHSCrisis mostly applies to @NHSEngland . The #NHS in scotland is awesome . I 💕 my job .
